meanings.definition: Given an excessive amount of medication.
meanings.sent1: The overmedicated patient felt very sleepy.
meanings.sent2: She was overmedicated and experienced side effects.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked overmedicated after accidentally eating too many treats.
meanings.sent4: The garden, overmedicated with fertilizer, grew wildly out of control.
meanings.sent5: The overmedicated student struggled to stay awake during class.

meanings.sent1: The doctor overmedicated the patient, causing complications.
meanings.sent2: They were worried the nurse would overmedicate the elderly man.
meanings.sent3: The robot accidentally overmedicated the entire town with cough syrup.
meanings.sent4: The chef overmedicated the soup with salt, making it inedible.
meanings.sent5: The coach warned the team not to overmedicate the injured player.
